title: Intermediate-Level Chinese Vocabulary Education Program Utilizing Gamification

context.prior_knowledge: Basic Chinese vocabulary and grammar proficiency at HSK Level 3 or higher
context.additional_context: A course for enhancing workplace-linked language proficiency for current practitioners. Game-based learning on personal devices followed by collaborative projects.

learning_goals: Learners acquire 1,200 essential HSK Level 5 vocabulary items with 90% accuracy within 6 months
Learners infer over 80% of new vocabulary using word decomposition/combination strategies
Learners apply vocabulary to 10+ work-related scenarios through collaborative PBL projects
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
